values: This journal is now officially friends only.  I don't think anyone other than my friends read it, so the change shouldn't really bother anyone.  However - if for some reason you have the burning desire to get inside my head, and read the gossip, drama, and other boring events of my life, by all means, drop a comment.

Hello everyone...

I answered the questions <lj user="abiona_sashenka"> sent me.  However, because i check my journal at work, and I am paranoid that someone at work might see it, i put it to friends only.  If you are just ripe with curiosity, and want to read it, let me know and I will add you to my friends list.....
